kDesc
A heavy-bodied blade with a thick blade body that can slash helmets in two. (Sheathed)\nAttacking Power: ★★★+[#Legal]
Un épais sabre capable de trancher un casque en deux. (Porté à la ceinture)\n Puissance d’attaque : ★★★+[#Legal]
Ein mächtiges Schwert, das einen Helm in 2 spalten kann. (Ungezogen)\n Angriff: ★★★+ [#Legal]
Una spada molto spessa che può spaccare un elmo in due. (riposta)\nAttacco: ★★★+[#Legal]
Una espada gruesa que puede partir un yelmo en dos. (envainada)\n Ataque: ★★★+ [#Legal]
刃肉が厚く、兜を真っ二つに割るほどの重厚な刀。（帯刀状態）\n攻撃力 ：★★★+[#Legal]
날이 두껍고, 투구를 두쪽으로 가를 만큼 중후한 칼. (납도 상태)\n공격력: ★★★+[#Legal]
A heavy-bodied blad with a thick blade body that can slash helmets into two. (Sheathed)\nAttacking Power: ★★★+[#Legal]
刀身厚，能將頭盔一分為二的重型刀。（帶刀狀態）\n攻擊力：★★★+[#Legal]
